radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: High-resolution MRI of the carotid arteries
radiographic_examinations.findings: Eccentric plaque containing a large lipid core with a thin fibrous cap in the left internal carotid artery; focal area of signal reduction within the plaque indicating the presence of USPIO.
High signal in the pons, basal ganglia, thalami, and cerebral peduncles.
